data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/uu4L7SR5xpGyZZPIUlxKRTW1CUi.jpg","id":728791,"title":"Playhouse","original_title":"Playhouse","overview":"Reckless Jack Travis is an irreverent horror writer notorious for scaring audiences. When the alarming supernatural forces start to close in on him too, Jack is forced to reckon with the terrifying consequences of creating such a dark and macabre play. At the same time she appears, something changes in the world. The forbidden Eternal Library awakens. In the Library is sealed the ultimate culmination of Alchemy, the White Demon Lord. The White Demon Lord plots to eliminate Arata and the Trinity Seven to usurp the position of Demon Lord.
